body_html:
TensorFlow can be built from sources (see https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources). However, the platforms you mention are not officially supported and we might not be able to provide much help in dealing with problems that arise.

That said, we encourage community contributions, so if you do get things to work, we'd encourage you to contribute back with the changes to code and/or documentation necessary.

Thanks!
body_text:
TensorFlow can be built from sources (see https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources). However, the platforms you mention are not officially supported and we might not be able to provide much help in dealing with problems that arise.
That said, we encourage community contributions, so if you do get things to work, we'd encourage you to contribute back with the changes to code and/or documentation necessary.

body:
TensorFlow can be built from sources (see https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources). However, the platforms you mention are not officially supported and we might not be able to provide much help in dealing with problems that arise.

That said, we encourage community contributions, so if you do get things to work, we'd encourage you to contribute back with the changes to code and/or documentation necessary.

Thanks!
